case.name: Donut_Hole
case.description: It appears that our mad duchess is a donut girl of some sorts, she even has a hole in her belly because of it.

notes.note:
1: Her general lines will often refer to how amazing she is, how amazing her castle is, how amazing her stuff is.
2: She will always see everyone else as less worthy, And will in general be unimpressed by other people stripping, she might like a thing or 2, but of course it won't ever be as good as her
3: When she loses, it will cause her to be frustrated and annoyed, someone as amazing as her shouldn't lose, that said, she gets frustrated because she loses, not because she has to strip, she and of course her body are perfect, so showing that off is not the problem, lowly peasant getting to see it are.
4: Same with having to forfeit, it's not that she has to please herself, because the only person that can do that anyway is her. But it is again the frustration that others get to see such a marvelous show that is above them.
5: And of course, her stripping something small is very important, while anyone else who does it is boring, wasting time, should do better to try and match her, etc
6: She won't shy away from saying what she thinks, even if it's legit a asshole thing to do, but that's not her problem.
7; she is also RICH, so big chance she will show that off, or belittle those that don't have it
8; Even though she sees everyone else as beneath her, She would still like the praise, and have people adore her, So when she has stripped, she will often show off, waiting for the praise to come.
---Something about being the shining example of how hot her figure is, or pretty much everything
She is a donut, be sure to focus her telling this
She is about to reveal her breasts, make sure that this isn't a *loudmouth mad for losing* moment, but a moment in which she is happy to show off how desirable she is
Talking about how confident she is and that she knows she is hot
Same thing with the breasts reveal, talk about her stunning figure.
She is about to reveal her crotch, be sure to focus on her figure.
